name: Push Down To Destroy
description:
Press down to destroy is a puzzle game when the time between pulsations is the key to demolish all houses. Can you beat my 30 seconds left score? This game was made in 48 hours for destruction game Jam!!

If you want, in .ZIP file has a guide in .PDF to destroy all houses.

  • CONTROLS

DOWN arrow: press the button.
LEFT & RIGHT arrows: move the camera to next/previous house.
R: restart when you fail.
ESC: exit to menu/game.

  • MUSIC

BBC News countdown - David Lowe and BBC.

  • ASSETS

Unity survival shooting game tutorial.
